thread.title: Sonam Kapoor and Salman Khan attend Radio Mirchi's Navratri celebrations in Mumbai
thread.title_full: Sonam Kapoor and Salman Khan attend Radio Mirchi's Navratri celebrations in Mumbai - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Sonam Kapoor and Salman Khan attend Radio Mirchi's Navratri celebrations in Mumbai
text:
One of India's top ranked radio stations, Radio Mirchi 98.3 took its Navratri celebrations 'Mirchi Rock n Dhol' a notch higher by having Salman Khan grace the venue and be a part of the festive spirit.
The actor was accompanied by his Prem Ratan Dhan Payo co-star Sonam Kapoor. The movie, releasing on November 12, promises to be a family entertainer and is expected to be one of the highest grossers in Indian cinema. As radio partners of the film, Radio Mirchi 98.3 also broke the music exclusively for its listeners. Salman, looking dapper in a blue shirt, and Sonam, dressed in an ethnic ensemble, danced to garba tunes and enthralled audiences at the do.
The guests even held a banner declaring the film to be a Rs 500 crore blockbuster. The 'Mirchi Rock n Dhol', organised by the radio station in multiple cities across the country, is regarded as one of the most premium Navratri celebrations. And the brand promises to bring more such events which audiences can look forward to.
